name: Tomato Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: If you could pour nostalgia into a bowl, it would look and taste like Tomato Soup. With a distinctive sweet and tangy tomato flavour and velvety texture, this blend is sugar and sodium-conscious and gluten free. Nutritional yeast brings creaminess to a soup that only requires two ingredients, tomato paste and water, and 20 minutes to make in the microwave. The only thing to add is a grilled cheese sandwich!
